attributes.action: Create a minimum wage for Under 16's with Saturday Jobs!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many under 16's have a saturday job or just a job that they do in their free time. There are not even any government guidelines as to what under 16's should get paid. There is a minimum wage for evryone over 16- so whats wrong with taking the time to make a minimum wage for under 16's? They tell you how long you can and can't work for so it's hardly any hassle!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
